attributes.description:
Has been designed to be strong and practical, with all the power you need to get the job done. A large load box with a maximum payload of 1200 kg, and a braked towing capacity of 2500 kg make it the hard working, dependable team player youve always wanted. All this comes with a contemporary look that includes a restyled signature Mahindra Single Cab 4x4 front grille with chrome inserts, dual projector headlamps, an integrated air-scoop in the bonnet, and tough wrap-around bumpers.
Optional service plan available with purchase at an additional cost.

attributes.description:
It all comes together in the NEW KUV100 NXT to redefine urban mobility once again.

This is no meek and mild wannabe - with its bold SUV stance, sporty styling and imposing good looks - its the ultimate urban warrior. This vehicle has ample room for five adults to travel in comfort, height adjustable driverâ€™s seat, durable high quality fabric upholstery, front and rear armrests with integrated cup holders. 

Not only is the Mahindra KUV100 stylish, the peppy mFalcon engine will let you push your limits. Even more refined, it is quiet and offers an enhanced driving experience with minimum in-cabin noise. 
AVAILABLE IN ALL MANUFACTURERS COLOURS

Warranty - 3 years / 100 000km

The next generation Mahindra Pik Up Single Cab has been designed to be strong and practical, with all the power you need to get the job done. A large load box with a maximum payload of 1200 kg, and a braked towing capacity of 2500 kg make it the hard working, dependable team player youve always wanted. All this comes with a contemporary look that includes a restyled signature Mahindra Single Cab 4x4 front grille with chrome inserts, dual projector headlamps, an integrated air-scoop in the bonnet, and tough wrap-around bumpers.

Service Plan - 5 years / 90 000km
Warranty - 4 years / 120 000km
